Articles.Content:
Does anyone know of a mod pack that has blue lights? I have red, green and white, I need some blue and potentially purple lights!

The smaller the actual part the better:)

(It's for a YouTube video)
B9 pack has some red and white lights if you can stand the rest of the parts, and there is the aviation lights pack which also adds red, white, and green lights.
As I said, those ate the lights I already have, from those packs exactly, Ty tho:)

As I said, those ate the lights I already have, from those packs exactly, Ty tho:)

I assume its possible with a bit of quick and dirty .cfg editing. I don't have the part packs though (right now), so I can't be more precise than that. I might download them in order to get a better look into lights myself.

I believe I may have found something that had blue but I'm not sure,, the vanguard plugin pack? One of the mods for that plugin has blue lights in its screenshot on spaceport, and I won't be able to find out for sure for another 9 hours when I get home :/ either way, if I can't find any ill start looking into a way to edit the light colors from the b9 lights to suit my needs, as I like those models.
